StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [DeleteMCFOPEvent]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MCFOPEventID uniqueiden..er
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
-- informa.on for an exisi.ng record can be inserted. IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [MCRISS].[USMC].[MCFOPMassEvent] where MCFOPMassEventID = @MCFOPEventID)
-- then update the exisi.ng record BEGIN
DELETE [MCRISS].[USMC].[Organiza.onEvent] WHERE Organiza.onEventID = (Select Organiza.onEventID From MCFOPMassEvent where MCFOPMassEventID= @MCFOPEventID)
DELETE [MCRISS].[USMC].[MCFOPMassEvent] where MCFOPMassEventID= @MCFOPEventID
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
